1.text: Begin by drawing outline sketches using pencil:

2.text: Draw vertical and horizontal guidelines lightly, within the head outline.

4.text: Draw curves for the front legs and ovals for the hind feet.

5.text: Darken the actual lines for the head and the body.

6.text: Add the detail shapes for the features of the face, using circles for the eyes, curves for the nose and mouth, and then erase any extra parts of the pencil sketches and guidelines.

8.text: Add the shadows, on the face and body, and the background.

9.text: Begin with the outline sketch of the head, using pencil.

10.text: Add a longer standing oval shape.

11.text: Sketch oval outlines for the lower back and the hips of the panda.

12.text: Add the outline sketches of the front legs, feet and hind legs.

13.text: Sketch 3 vertical lines and one horizontal line as guidelines for the eyes.

14.text: Add the nose and mouth outline sketches.

15.text: Draw the outline sketches for the ears.

16.text: Darken the light outline sketches for the actual detail lines.

17.text: Get oil pastels or crayons to color the panda (option:
